item.title: Some Words Are Too Awkward to Say
item.description:
So I'd just type them here and be quiet.

Today is my last day at bitmaker.

I've learned so much in the past two months. Countless first times. From never used a terminal to git pushing everyday, from never messed with anything other than Windows, to being able to reinstall …
item.dc:creator: Yue Teng

item.title: Evaluating Clustering Models
item.description:
This week I looked into some model evaluation metrics for clustering methods, which I'm going to summarize here.

There are two situations when we are dealing with clustering model evaluation. The first one is simple, which is when our data has the ground truth attached to them (i.e., we …
item.dc:creator: Yue Teng

item.title: ROC-AUC Explained
item.description: Receiver Operating Characteristic (ROC) curve and Area Under (the ROC) Curve (AUC) are frequently used metrics for evaluating models that distinguish between two categorical outcomes (e.g., survival of a patient, pass/fail of a test). The rule is that the higher up the curve (i.e., further away from …

item.title: Python Visualization
item.description:
Having struggled with Python visualizations for a week, I decided to come up with a simple guide to help myself out when it comes to picking up visualization tools for specific plots. There are a number of them and each is good for quite different purposes.

matplotlib
